articles.title: Cannabis, cocaine, methamphetamine, and opiates increase risk of atrial fibrillation - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: A recent study published in the European Heart Journal reveals that using illicit drugs can increase atrial fibrillation risk.
articles.content:
A recent study published in the European Heart Journal reveals that using illicit drugs can increase atrial fibrillation risk.
